name: places/ChIJ1y-FlFBZwokREF1iSrVvqHc
formattedAddress: 61 W 87th St, New York, NY 10024, USA
adrFormatAddress: 61 W 87th St, New York, NY 10024, USA

originalText.text:
We hired Voytech Technologies to install AV systems in our NYC apartment renovation in 2013 covering, WiFi, speakers, TV’s, HVAC and Blinds.   We recently updated some of the systems - going with Fios, Sonos, Nest thermostats and Apple TV’s.  All of this was done very professionally.   I am writing this review because Voytek (the owner of Voytech) just impressed me all over again.   We were having some HVAC issues and the company we use, simply could not figure it out - blaming everything and everyone else.   I asked Voytek to get involved to ensure the Nest’s weren’t somehow confusing the HVAC as was being suggested.   In the end, Voytek instructed and directed the HVAC guys how to do with a/c equipment what they should have known to do but didn’t and weren’t much interested in figuring out.   So not only is Voytek our AV genius, he has now branched beyond his wheelhouse, to also solve the HVAC challenge.
The key is that he is smart, very experienced, scrupulously honest, extremely responsive and fair with his pricing.   His tech guys have been with him since 2013 and are equally competent.
For a non-tech guy like me, AV is a really confusing field and having someone you can truly rely on and trust is so important.   Voytek and his company Voytech is a great choice and I am very pleased to work with him and his team.
